level.heading: Approval of agreement by tribunal.
level.text: The tribunal may approve an agreement resulting from a collaborative law process.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-,125, see notes under ยง 16-4001.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 8 of the Uniform Collaborative Law Act. See Vol. 7 , Part 1B, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
